subject: Re: [junit] JUnit testing of servlet and HTTP servlet requests
msgSnippet: ... Right. Those are the introductory chapter and the chapter on XML. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca Your guide to software craftsmanship
messageBody:
